commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The ocean! It's so beautiful, and Mt. Fuji is so close.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I should take some pictures and show them to everyone in the club. Now to focus...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Blue sky, blue ocean, green scenery. Nijigasaki is close to the ocean too, but this place is totally different.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Aqours get to see this every day. I bet a place with this much freedom really fills you with inspiration for songs.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hm?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Someone's down on the beach. Is it a tourist? Maybe it's a local.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (She's just standing there staring out at the ocean. She looks like she's contemplating hard about something, too.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I-Is she?! N-No, don't!
Eeek! Wh-What the heck?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Think things through! I'm here to lend an ear!
Umm, I think you're confused. I was just admiring the ocean.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Um, oh... Right. Good. Sorry for all the commotion.
That's okay. I'm sorry, too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Y-You're...Riko! You're Riko Sakurauchi from Aqours! Right?!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: What? Y-Yes, I am.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Whoa...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's really you. I actually met someone from Aqours at the beach. I can't believe it. Please shake my hand!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: M-Me? Well, if you want to...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thank you so much!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: No, thank you. Hey, you don't have to be so formal. Just talk like we're friends.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A-Are you sure?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay. Um, I came here from Tokyo to meet Aqours.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: All the way from Tokyo? To meet us?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. I saw your live show with Î¼'s and just had to meet you all in person.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I was just at Uranohoshi High and someone told me I might find a member of Aqours at the beach.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Oh, so that's why I heard you get so excited about someone being on the beach.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: So you came to see that performance. Thanks. I'm glad you came all the way out here to see us in person.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I was so...moved. That performance got me interested in school idols!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Now I'm in the idol club at the school I go to.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Really? So you're a school idol, too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, not exactly. I'm in more of a support position.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And in order to support everyone even better, I wanted to talk to Aqours and learn from you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What's practice usually like? Who writes your songs?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What mentality do you have when you're performing?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: H-Hold on a sec! I can't answer all these questions at once.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, sorry.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: It might be better to ask all these questions when everyone's around. It'd be a pain to ask everyone separately, right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But today is... Oh yeah, aren't you guys helping prep for the Summer Festival?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Yeah. We've been working late every day for a while, so we decided to take the day off.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I see. I guess that means I won't be able to meet everyone today. They're all probably relaxing on their day off.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I'm not so sure. Just because it's a day off doesn't mean they're actually taking it off. Especially considering the circumstances...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (The circumstances?)

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Actually, you might be able to meet Chika today. She's my neighbor. Want to go?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Can I?!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Of course.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sweet! That'd be great!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Okay, let's get going.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All right!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, Riko... You looked kind of down when you were staring out at the ocean. Is everything okay?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I know we just met, but it's been bothering me. Are things not going well?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I knew it was written all over my face when you got that worried about me, but am I really that easy to read?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Um, well...

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: *Giggle* I'm sorry. Something has been on my mind. The song for the Summer Festival.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A song? Oh yeah, you guys are performing, right? Are you going to sing a new song?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: We haven't written one yet. We're working on the lyrics right now. Well, Chika is working on the words. I'm writing the music.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (They're working on a new Aqours song right now! I couldn't have picked a better time to come to Numazu!)

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: We've hit a roadblock with our song writing, though. I'm trying to come up with ideas, yet I'm drawing nothing but blanks.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: So, I came down to the beach to try to clear my mind.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Does looking at the ocean do that?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: For me, anyway. When I wrote songs, well actually when I was worried about my piano performances, listening to the sound of the ocean helped me clear my head.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh, I see.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: So, I came back hoping to clear my head again and face the music, so to speak. Sorry if I sound weird.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Don't be. So that's how you write music. I'm excited. It feels like I've been let in on the secret to Aqours' music!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Well, I don't always do this. Just once in a while! Today is special.
